Balayage

Create flashes of colour from beneath to individualize your cut. Adds definition to layers and depth to fine hair. With total colour shine all over. This colour is so hot right now and we are seeing different variations in the salon go sun kiss natural or create strong dipped ends. Great for low maintenance. A freehand colouring technique originating in France, Balayage is a natural looking, low-maintenance option when it comes to highlighting your hair. Read more about the Balayage effect here. From 45-90 minutes depending on effect. Price on consultation.

Visit our FAQ’s page for any questions you may have on creative colouring.

Foilage Freestyle Colouring

With many of today’s highlighted looks being highly personalised, Freestyle colour allows the team at Luxe to create a look unique to you.

Using techniques such as Freehand Balayage, Stretched Foils, Root Stretching, Colour Melting, Babylights and Traditional Foiling – This is perfect for the signature Luxe “Lived in Colour” look.

Speak to your stylist on how we can create this for you.
